div.p: … our … father, apostle … of all others [he/she/they] loved … all the brothers with you [those whom] … All the brothers in the church greet you. Father and mother greet [the brothers]. The mother of Taesis/Taesion greets [you all]. And [I/we/you/they] went down … I pray that you may be well for the longest span of life.
Deliver to father Epinikos from Theodoros. Translation: J.J. McLaughlin, ZPE 184 (2013) 277
